    • Class com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.Polynomial

      class Polynomial extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • polyParams
          double[] polyParams
          Array containing parameters defining a polynomial. For a polynomial having the expression p(x) = a + b*x + c*x^2 + ... provided array must be [a, b, c, ...]

  • Package com.irurueta.numerical.signal.processing

    • Class com.irurueta.numerical.signal.processing.KalmanFilter

      class KalmanFilter extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controlMatrix
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix controlMatrix
          Control matrix (B) (it is not used if there is no control).
        • cp
          int cp
          Number of control vector dimensions (control parameters).
        • dp
          int dp
          Number of state vector dimensions (dynamic parameters).
        • errorCovPost
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix errorCovPost
          Posteriori error estimate covariance matrix (P(k)): P(k)=(I-K(k)*H)*P'(k)
        • errorCovPre
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix errorCovPre
          Priori error estimate covariance matrix (P'(k)): P'(k)=A*P(k-1)*At + Q)
        • gain
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix gain
          Kalman gain matrix (K(k)): K(k)=P'(k)*Ht*inv(H*P'(k)*Ht+R)
        • measurementMatrix
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix measurementMatrix
          Measurement matrix (H).
        • measurementNoiseCov
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix measurementNoiseCov
          Measurement noise covariance matrix (R).
        • mp
          int mp
          Number of measurement vector dimensions (measure parameters).
        • processNoiseCov
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix processNoiseCov
          Process noise covariance matrix (Q).
        • statePost
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix statePost
          Corrected state (x(k)): x(k)=x'(k)+K(k)*(z(k)-H*x'(k))
        • statePre
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix statePre
          Predicted state (x'(k)): x(k)=A*x(k-1)+B*u(k)
        • temp1
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp1
          Temporary matrix 1.
        • temp2
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp2
          Temporary matrix 2.
        • temp3
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp3
          Temporary matrix 3.
        • temp4
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp4
          Temporary matrix 4.
        • temp5
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp5
          Temporary matrix 5.
        • temp6
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp6
          Temporary matrix 6.
        • temp7
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp7
          Temporary matrix 7.
        • temp8
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix temp8
          Temporary matrix 8.
        • transitionMatrix
          com.irurueta.algebra.Matrix transitionMatrix
          State transition matrix (A).
